News.headline: New Signing: Daggers Sign Defender Okuonaghae
News.page_title: New Signing: Daggers Sign Defender Okuonaghae
News.URL_keywords: New Signing: Daggers Sign Defender Okuonaghae
News.short_description: The Daggers have signed defender Magnus Okuonghae on a short term deal.
News.description:
The former Daggers player signed a contract until the 2nd January 2017, after his release from Luton Town in the summer. 

Magnus Okuonghae was previously with the Daggers from May 2007 to July 2009 making 55 appearances and scoring two goals. 

After leaving the Daggers, Magnus signed for Colchester United where he was made club captain during his time there and made over 200 appearances in a six year spell for the club before signing for Luton Town in June 2015. 

Okuonaghae only made 11 appearances for the Hatters and spent time on loan at Hartlepool United making four appearances before being released by the club in the summer of 2016. 

Magnus will wear number 26 and will be in the squad to face Barrow at home in the Vanarama National league tomorrow.
